name: Class MetalInternalFrameTitlePane
text: Class that manages a JLF title bar

fields.description: The height of the palette title.

methods.description:
Override the parent's method to do nothing. Metal frames do not
 have system menus.

 have system menus.

Override the parent's method to do nothing. Metal frames do not
 have system menus.

Override the parent's method avoid creating a menu bar. Metal frames
 do not have system menus.
If b is true, sets palette icons.
